Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for choosing LegalZoom for your incorporation order. Please follow the steps listed below to complete your order.
Next steps: • Do not make any changes to the attached document as it will result in delays with your order. If you need to make changes, please contact our Customer Support. • Print two (2) copies of the document on white paper using black ink. Please do not use color ink. • Sign your name in black ink on all copies as indicated. • Complete sections A, B, and C of the attached Certificate of Disclosure form. Sign at the bottom section marked "By" and date where indicated. • Mail the documents to our address listed below.
Courier Deliveries LegalZoom.com, Inc. ATTN: Business Filings 101 North Brand Blvd. 10th Flr. Glendale, CA 91203
USPS Deliveries LegalZoom.com, Inc. ATTN: Business Filings 101 North Brand Blvd., 10th Flr. POB 29096 Glendale, CA 91203
• Alternatively, you can fax the signed documents to (323) 962-4521. Please include your name and order number on the fax coversheet to ensure proper routing of your document to our processing team.
If you have any questions regarding your order, please contact our {!snippetVariable.cc_dept_full} at {!snippetVariable.ccphone} or customercare@legalzoom.com. Please include your order number in your correspondences for prompt service.
{!snippetVariable.ccsincerely}
